original_title: 素人カップルモニタリング徹底検証 街中でところかまわずイチャつくカップルたちに突撃して過激ミッション要求！カメラの前でカップル同士が交換スワッピングSEXできたら高額賞金100万円差し上げます！！ 横山夏希
overview: Call out to two couples who are flirting in the city. A game with a prize will be held to compete for which couple has the highest degree of love. Have them aim for clearing by challenging rich kissing and petting! !! Show off the love love erotic degree to each other and develop into swapping at the end with a big excitement of serious excitement! !! A total of 4 couples appearing! !!
title: An Amateur Couple Focus Group Investigation We Went On A Search For A Lovey Dovey Couple Anywhere On The Street And Asked Them To Take On An Extreme Mission! If This Couple Can Engage In Partner Swapping In Front Of Our Cameras, They'll Win 1 Million Yen!!
